column1: 3.1 - DEFAULT AXES AND CHART TITLE POSITIONS (red = inner plot area, blue = outer plot area, green = titles, yellow = title and legend space)
3.2 - MANUAL AXES AND CHART TITLE POSITIONS (shapes on the charts: red = inner plot area, green = titles)

column5: 2D bar chart, secondary axes set, titles bottom-right

column1: 3.3 - ROTATION (shapes on the charts: red = inner plot area, green = titles, yellow = bounding rectangle for rotated titles)
